settings.caption: about kailo
settings.title: how does the kailo works?
settings.description:
Kailo is made with a patented technology that is being developed for use in high-tech applications like antennas, signal transmission, bio-identification, and energy storage.

The effectiveness of this technology for pain management has been developed by Kailo. The Kailo pain patch is designed to boost the natural signals of the body and help the brain communicate with disrupted areas more effectively.

settings.title: THE SCIENCE BEHIND KAILO
settings.description: Kailo technology is a uniquely organized sheet of capacitors. Capacitors are electrical components used by radios and computers to manage and transmit data. Kailo capacitors assist the axons of your nervous system to manage and transmit the signals of your body.
settings.subtitle: THE KAILO AND THE AXON
The final results from the IRB-approved study demonstrated that
settings.title: Patients who used Kailo over a period of 30 days showed a vast reduction of their pain severity levels.
settings.description:
They also experienced a better quality of life, improved function, were very satisfied with the Kailo Pain Patch, and preferred the patch over oral pain medications.

"With the increased focus on identifying alternative therapies for patients experiencing pain, the use and ongoing research of novel approaches including the non-drug and microtechnology based Kailo patch, seem to have a very positive effect on patients who are experiencing mild, moderate, and chronic pain.”
settings.author: Jeffrey Gudin, MD | Principal Investigator

settings.caption: clinical trials
settings.title: The Results Are In And They're Amazing

settings.blockquote: "My hand had osteoarthritis and I use the kailo for 5 minutes and I free of pain for the rest of the day is GOOD gracias all of you"
"I’m training for a 500 mile walk and my hip was killing me. I placed the Kailo patch in two places and my pain is gone! I used a small piece near my ear and it’s also helping diminish my tinnitus."

"Hi, as a repeat customer, I wish to express my total satisfaction of your Kailo pain product. I never would believe how such a thing could relieve pain like this. I have been spreading the extra ones that I purchased among my family and they just love it also."
"Quick shipping, great value, and has always reduced or eliminated pain when placed properly. This is the second one I ordered. Very satisfied customer."
"Thanks this has been a break through in pain management for my wife and your products make it possible."
"So far the Kailo patch has worked for both my husband and me! I have also shared our stories with family and friends"

"Noticed a difference right away! I was able to work my whole shift without a pain reliever! Total Game Changer! it leaves no marks or sticky rings on the skin and is easy to move. Great product all the way around! I've told everyone i know about it!"
